Public Member Functions
gaussian_init_boundary_condition Module Reference

Initial conditions for examples It can fill an array with 1D Gaussin function, rectangular, and triangular, and also it can fill discontinuities. In case of multi-constituents tehy have to initialize separately. More...

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

subroutine fill_gaussian (vals, nloc, origin, dx, mean, sd, scale)
 Fill array with 1D gaussian shape This routine expects a 1D array, so multi-constituents have to be initialized separately fill_guassian(OUTPUT,num_cell,Left side of domain,dx,Center,sigma,a) f(x) = a*exp(-(x-b)^2/(2c^2)) [c is sigma].
subroutine gaussian (val, xposition, center, sd, scale)
 Compute a point value of a gaussian function f(x) = a*exp(-(x-b)^2/(2c^2)) , [c is sigma] where a is a scale factor, b is the center/mean and is a distance/standard deviation.
subroutine derivative_gaussian (val, xposition, center, sd, scale)
 Compute the slope of gaussian shape, base on sigma, center of shape, scale factor and distance from the center derivative_gaussian(OUTPUT or df/dx,x,center or miu,sigma,scale or a) f(x) = a*exp(-(x-b)^2/(2c^2)) , [c is sigma] df(x)/dx = -a*2*(x-b)/(2c^2)*exp(-(x-b)^2/(2c^2))
subroutine neumann_diffusion_matrix (center_diag, up_diag, down_diag, right_hand_side, conc, explicit_diffuse_op, area, area_lo, area_hi, disp_coef_lo, disp_coef_hi, theta_stm, ncell, time, nvar, dx, dt)
 Example diffusive flux that imposes Neumann boundaries with zero flux at both ends of the channel.
subroutine n_d_test_diffusion_matrix (center_diag, up_diag, down_diag, right_hand_side, conc, explicit_diffuse_op, area, area_lo, area_hi, disp_coef_lo, disp_coef_hi, theta_stm, ncell, time, nvar, dx, dt)
 Example diffusion matrix values imposes Dirichlet and Nuemann boundaries at the ends of the channel.
subroutine dirichlet_test_diffusion_matrix (center_diag, up_diag, down_diag, right_hand_side, conc, explicit_diffuse_op, area, area_lo, area_hi, disp_coef_lo, disp_coef_hi, theta_stm, ncell, time, nvar, dx, dt)
 Example diffusion matrix values imposes Dirichlet boundaries at both ends of the channel.
subroutine n_d_test_diffusive_flux (diffusive_flux_lo, diffusive_flux_hi, conc, area_lo, area_hi, disp_coef_lo, disp_coef_hi, ncell, nvar, time, dx, dt)
 Example diffusive flux that imposes Neumann boundary at one end and Dirichlet boundary at the other end of the channel.
subroutine dirichlet_test_diffusive_flux (diffusive_flux_lo, diffusive_flux_hi, conc, area_lo, area_hi, disp_coef_lo, disp_coef_hi, ncell, nvar, time, dx, dt)
 Example diffusive flux that imposes Dirichlet boundaries at both ends of the channel.
subroutine neumann_gaussian_diffusive_flux (diffusive_flux_lo, diffusive_flux_hi, conc, area_lo, area_hi, disp_coef_lo, disp_coef_hi, ncell, nvar, time, dx, dt)

 Example diffusive flux that imposes Neumann boundary at one end and Dirichlet boundary at the other end of the channel.
subroutine dirichlet_test_diffusive_flux (diffusive_flux_lo, diffusive_flux_hi, conc, area_lo, area_hi, disp_coef_lo, disp_coef_hi, ncell, nvar, time, dx, dt)
 Example diffusive flux that imposes Dirichlet boundaries at both ends of the channel.
subroutine neumann_gaussian_diffusive_flux (diffusive_flux_lo, diffusive_flux_hi, conc, area_lo, area_hi, disp_coef_lo, disp_coef_hi, ncell, nvar, time, dx, dt)
 Example diffusive flux that imposes Neumann boundaries with zero flux at both ends of the channel.

Detailed Description

Initial conditions for examples It can fill an array with 1D Gaussin function, rectangular, and triangular, and also it can fill discontinuities. In case of multi-constituents tehy have to initialize separately.

Member Function/Subroutine Documentation

subroutine gaussian_init_boundary_condition::derivative_gaussian ( real(stm_real), intent(out)  val,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  xposition,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  center,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  sd,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  scale 
)

Compute the slope of gaussian shape, base on sigma, center of shape, scale factor and distance from the center derivative_gaussian(OUTPUT or df/dx,x,center or miu,sigma,scale or a) f(x) = a*exp(-(x-b)^2/(2c^2)) , [c is sigma] df(x)/dx = -a*2*(x-b)/(2c^2)*exp(-(x-b)^2/(2c^2))

Parameters:
[out]valvalue to be produced
[in]xpositionX
[in]centercenter of gaussian shape
[in]sdStandard deviation (Sigma)
[in]scaleScale
subroutine gaussian_init_boundary_condition::derivative_gaussian ( real(stm_real), intent(out)  val,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  xposition,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  center,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  sd,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  scale 
)

Compute the slope of gaussian shape, base on sigma, center of shape, scale factor and distance from the center derivative_gaussian(OUTPUT or df/dx,x,center or miu,sigma,scale or a) f(x) = a*exp(-(x-b)^2/(2c^2)) , [c is sigma] df(x)/dx = -a*2*(x-b)/(2c^2)*exp(-(x-b)^2/(2c^2))

Parameters:
[out]valvalue to be produced
[in]xpositionX
[in]centercenter of gaussian shape
[in]sdStandard deviation (Sigma)
[in]scaleScale
subroutine gaussian_init_boundary_condition::dirichlet_test_diffusion_matrix ( real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(inout)  center_diag,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(inout)  up_diag,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(inout)  down_diag,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(inout)  right_hand_side,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(in)  conc,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(in)  explicit_diffuse_op,
real(stm_real), dimension (ncell), intent(in)  area,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell), intent(in)  area_lo,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell), intent(in)  area_hi,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell), intent(in)  disp_coef_lo,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell), intent(in)  disp_coef_hi,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  theta_stm,
integer, intent(in)  ncell,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  time,
integer, intent(in)  nvar,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  dx,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  dt 
)

Example diffusion matrix values imposes Dirichlet boundaries at both ends of the channel.

Parameters:
[in]ncellNumber of cells
[in]nvarNumber of variables
[in,out]down_diagValues of the coefficients below diagonal in matrix
[in,out]center_diagValues of the coefficients at the diagonal in matrix
[in,out]up_diagValues of the coefficients above the diagonal in matrix
[in,out]right_hand_sideValues of the coefficients of right hand side vector
[in]concConcentration
[in]explicit_diffuse_opExplicit diffusive operator
[in]areaCell centered area at new time
[in]area_loLow side area at new time
[in]area_hiHigh side area at new time
[in]disp_coef_loLow side constituent dispersion coef. at new time
[in]disp_coef_hiHigh side constituent dispersion coef. at new time
[in]timeCurrent time
[in]theta_stmExplicitness coefficient; 0 is explicit, 0.5 Crank-Nicolson, 1 full implicit
[in]dxSpatial step
[in]dtTime step
subroutine gaussian_init_boundary_condition::dirichlet_test_diffusion_matrix ( real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(inout)  center_diag,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(inout)  up_diag,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(inout)  down_diag,

real(stm_real), dimension(ncell), intent(in)  area_hi,

real(stm_real), intent(in)  dt 
)

Example diffusion matrix values imposes Dirichlet boundaries at both ends of the channel.

subroutine gaussian_init_boundary_condition::dirichlet_test_diffusive_flux ( real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(inout)  diffusive_flux_lo,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(inout)  diffusive_flux_hi,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(in)  conc,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell), intent(in)  area_lo,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell), intent(in)  area_hi,

integer, intent(in)  nvar,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  time,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  dx,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  dt 
)

Example diffusive flux that imposes Dirichlet boundaries at both ends of the channel.

Parameters:
[in]ncellNumber of cells
[in]nvarNumber of variables
[in,out]diffusive_flux_loFace flux, lo side
[in,out]diffusive_flux_hiFace flux, hi side
[in]area_loLow side area centered at time
[in]area_hiHigh side area centered at time
[in]timeTime
[in]concConcentration
[in]disp_coef_loLow side constituent dispersion coef.
[in]disp_coef_hiHigh side constituent dispersion coef.
[in]dtTime step
[in]dxSpatial step

subroutine gaussian_init_boundary_condition::fill_gaussian ( real(stm_real), dimension(nloc), intent(out)  vals,
integer, intent(in)  nloc,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  origin,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  dx,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  mean,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  sd,
real(stm_real), intent(in), optional  scale 
)

Fill array with 1D gaussian shape This routine expects a 1D array, so multi-constituents have to be initialized separately fill_guassian(OUTPUT,num_cell,Left side of domain,dx,Center,sigma,a) f(x) = a*exp(-(x-b)^2/(2c^2)) [c is sigma].

Parameters:
[in]nlocNumber of cells (size of array)
[out]valsValues to be filled
[in]originOrigin (lo side of channel)
[in]dxdx
[in]meanCenter of the gaussian shape
[in]sdStandard deviation (Sigma)
[in]scalescale
subroutine gaussian_init_boundary_condition::fill_gaussian ( real(stm_real), dimension(nloc), intent(out)  vals,
integer, intent(in)  nloc,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  origin,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  dx,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  mean,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  sd,
real(stm_real), intent(in), optional  scale 
)

Fill array with 1D gaussian shape This routine expects a 1D array, so multi-constituents have to be initialized separately fill_guassian(OUTPUT,num_cell,Left side of domain,dx,Center,sigma,a) f(x) = a*exp(-(x-b)^2/(2c^2)) [c is sigma].

Parameters:
[in]nlocNumber of cells (size of array)
[out]valsValues to be filled
[in]originOrigin (lo side of channel)
[in]dxdx
[in]meanCenter of the gaussian shape
[in]sdStandard deviation (Sigma)
[in]scalescale

real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(inout)  up_diag,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(inout)  down_diag,

real(stm_real), intent(in)  dt 
)

Example diffusion matrix values imposes Dirichlet and Nuemann boundaries at the ends of the channel.

Parameters:
[in]ncellNumber of cells
[in]nvarNumber of variables
[in,out]down_diagValues of the coefficients below diagonal in matrix
[in,out]center_diagValues of the coefficients at the diagonal in matrix
[in,out]up_diagValues of the coefficients above the diagonal in matrix
[in,out]right_hand_sideValues of the coefficients of right hand side vector
[in]concConcentration
[in]explicit_diffuse_opExplicit diffusive operator
[in]areaCell centered area at new time
[in]area_loLow side area at new time
[in]area_hiHigh side area at new time
[in]disp_coef_loLow side constituent dispersion coef. at new time
[in]disp_coef_hiHigh side constituent dispersion coef. at new time
[in]timeCurrent time
[in]theta_stmExplicitness coefficient; 0 is explicit, 0.5 Crank-Nicolson, 1 full implicit
[in]dxSpatial step
[in]dtTime step

real(stm_real), intent(in)  time,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  dx,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  dt 
)

Example diffusive flux that imposes Neumann boundary at one end and Dirichlet boundary at the other end of the channel.

Parameters:
[in]ncellNumber of cells
[in]nvarNumber of variables
[in,out]diffusive_flux_loFace flux, lo side
[in,out]diffusive_flux_hiFace flux, hi side
[in]area_loLow side area centered at time
[in]area_hiHigh side area centered at time
[in]timeTime
[in]concConcentration
[in]disp_coef_loLow side constituent dispersion coef.
[in]disp_coef_hiHigh side constituent dispersion coef.
[in]dtSpatial step
[in]dxTime step

real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(inout)  diffusive_flux_hi,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(in)  conc,

real(stm_real), dimension(ncell), intent(in)  area_hi,

integer, intent(in)  nvar,

real(stm_real), intent(in)  dx,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  dt 
)

subroutine gaussian_init_boundary_condition::neumann_diffusion_matrix ( real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(inout)  center_diag,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(inout)  up_diag,

)

Example diffusive flux that imposes Neumann boundaries with zero flux at both ends of the channel.

Parameters:
[in]ncellNumber of cells
[in]nvarNumber of variables
[in,out]down_diagValues of the coefficients below diagonal in matrix
[in,out]center_diagValues of the coefficients at the diagonal in matrix
[in,out]up_diagValues of the coefficients above the diagonal in matrix
[in,out]right_hand_sideValues of the coefficients of the right hand side
[in]concConcentration
[in]explicit_diffuse_opExplicit diffusive operator
[in]areaCell centered area at new time
[in]area_loLow side area at new time
[in]area_hiHigh side area at new time
[in]disp_coef_loLow side constituent dispersion coef. at new time
[in]disp_coef_hiHigh side constituent dispersion coef. at new time
[in]timeCurrent time
[in]theta_stmExplicitness coefficient; 0 is explicit, 0.5 Crank-Nicolson, 1 full implicit
[in]dxSpatial step
[in]dtTime step
